title: Nidalee Splash Update - This cat’s got new claws

replies.body: They should really update Urgot skins cuz like literally hasnt been updated ever since it came out...{{champion:6}} {{item:3070}}
Giant enemy crabgot is a god tier skin though
^ Scam
Might be a bit crabby tho

I think the new Nidalee Splash arts are over-sexualized. I get that sex sells, but these are borderline debauchery. Go take a cold shower Riot.

Love,

Hairy Lobster

Snow and Leopard are definitely not sexualised. They're probably even less so now. Pharaoh... Meh. Old splashart was absolutely terrible. As for French Maid, the new one isn't any more sexualised than the old one (that skin gets called "balloon tits" for a reason).
Bewitching is absolutely adorable though.

I agree Pharaoh is fine, the garb is accurate. Bewitching is OK too. I think they got it wrong in the first place with her splashes, and the skin choices themselves. From lore, she's supposed to be like a wild animal (as she was raised), not an ovum-laden stripper.
We have another 'tracer butt pose' situation here guys. Incoming SJWs.
